text: No fathers or mothers think their own children ugly.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

text: You have to support your children to have a healthy relationship.
author: Connie Sellecca

text: The child supplies the power but the parents have to do the steering.
author: Benjamin Spock

text: If you're asking your kids to exercise, then you better do it, too. Practice what you preach.
author: Bruce Jenner

text: It's a huge change for your body. You don't even want to look in the mirror after you've had a baby, because your stomach is just hanging there like a Shar-Pei.
author: Cindy Crawford
